name: jojen
description: Expressive validator for Node and the browser, with a small footprint and awesome performance

scripts.debug: node debug node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -r test/_setup.js --compilers js:babel-register && eslint lib
scripts.sizeBrowser: browserify lib/index.js -t babelify --presets es2015 | ccjs --compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS | gzip | wc -c

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
